name: Edmonton Journal: autohide the menu & sidebar
description: Auto-hide the page header and footer as icons in the upper-left and lower right corners, and autohide the sidebar at the left edge of the screen. Optionally, remove the ads, comments, and/or social media buttons.
additional_info:
• The front page layout is unchanged. All other pages are styled.
  • Hover over a placeholder to restore the header, footer, or sidebar.
  • The placeholder icons are animated to make them easier to find.
  • The "More on this story" sidebar is moved to the right of the article text.
Also styles the "Calgary Herald", the Regina "Leader-Post", the "Ottawa Citizen", the Saskatoon "StarPhoenix", the Vancouver "Province", and the "Vancouver Sun", in addition to the "Edmonton Journal".
